job_details.Vacaturetitel: Big Data Engineer for AI Training
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_details.full_text:
Big Data Engineer for AI Training

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI tools to enhance productivity and assist in training AI models, rather than on the core development, engineering, or deployment of AI systems. The tasks involve crafting questions and evaluating AI-generated code, which aligns with the use of AI tools for productivity enhancement rather than building AI systems themselves. There is no mention of core AI engineering tasks like model development, fine-tuning, MLOps, or building AI-powered applications.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'help the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models' indicates an understanding of how the work contributes to business goals of improving AI models for clients.
job_tasks.phrase: help the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models

job_tasks.justification: The core activity described is 'train AI models' and 'help train AI large language models', which directly relates to the process of model training.
The phrase 'engaging with these models as they learn to code' implies an interaction with the model during its learning or training phase.
job_tasks.phrase: engaging with these models as they learn to code

job_tasks.justification: The description asks for 'experienced software engineer' and 'talented coders', indicating a need for software development skills.
The phrase 'lend your coding expertise to train AI models' highlights the application of coding skills in the context of AI training.
job_tasks.phrase: lend your coding expertise to train AI models

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'Crafting and answering questions related to computer science', which requires the ability to generate content and structure information, akin to software development tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science

job_tasks.justification: The task of 'Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models' involves assessing and judging code, which is a form of software analysis and development-related activity.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

soft_skills.phrase: no requirement for previous AI experience
freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
